short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes "Learn Prolog Now!" look and feel better.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- embedded Swish IDE (SWI-Prolog)
- syntax highlighting of code snippets
- keyword and semantic highlighting
- pretty

The interactive version is located at http://lpn.swi-prolog.org/
The source code is available at: https://github.com/matthias-vogt/lpn-enhanced/
